title: OCE Lagging
body:
Hi Guys Im justing saying i useally have around about 27 ping now its jumping to 500 plus lots of people have been complain why is it so laggy?
Thanks Specs

replies.body:
This has been happening to me and many others since towards the mid to end of december last year and until now it got worse... 
progress report, from 800+ping up to 4.3k ping spikes tht are rly constant
